languages.text: "Вы — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, и друг Денза. Хотите вмешаться — вмешивайтесь. Да хоть единолично назначьте наследника — я слова поперек не скажу. С {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратумом{/g} могут быть проблемы, но... я знаю, кому бросить кость, чтоб их решить".

traits.locale_text: "Вы — Вольный Торговец, и друг Денза. Хотите вмешаться — вмешивайтесь. Да хоть единолично назначьте наследника — я слова поперек не скажу. С Администратумом могут быть проблемы, но... я знаю, кому бросить кость, чтоб их решить".

languages.text: "You are a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and Denz's friend. If you want to intervene, then do so. Name the heir yourself, if you like, I won't voice a word of protest. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."
languages.original_text: "Вы — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, и друг Денза. Хотите вмешаться — вмешивайтесь. Да хоть единолично назначьте наследника — я слова поперек не скажу. С {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратумом{/g} могут быть проблемы, но... я знаю, кому бросить кость, чтоб их решить".

traits.locale_text: "You are a Rogue Trader and Denz's friend. If you want to intervene, then do so. Name the heir yourself, if you like, I won't say a word of protest. There might be issues with the Administratum, but... I know who to throw a bone to solve them."

"You are a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and Denz's friend. If you want to intervene, then do so. Name the heir yourself, if you like, I won't voice a word of protest. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

languages.text: “你是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，还是丹兹的朋友。如果你打算插手，那就插手吧。如果你愿意的话，你甚至可以指定你自己为丹兹的继承人，我不会有任何反对意见。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}那边可能会有些麻烦，不过……我知道该如何不动声色地解决这些麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "You are a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and Denz's friend. If you want to intervene, then do so. Name the heir yourself, if you like, I won't voice a word of protest. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: “你是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，还是丹兹的朋友。如果你打算插手，那就插手吧。如果你愿意的话，你甚至可以指定你自己为丹兹的继承人，我不会有任何反对意见。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}那边可能会有些麻烦，不过……我知道该如何不动声色地解决这些麻烦。”

languages.text: «Es {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y amig{mf|o|a} de Denz. Si quiere intervenir, es libre de hacerlo. Nombre al heredero personalmente, si lo desea; yo no protestaré. Puede que haya problemas con el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, pero... sé qué regalos enviar para que olviden este asunto».
languages.original_text: "You are a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and Denz's friend. If you want to intervene, then do so. Name the heir yourself, if you like, I won't voice a word of protest. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: «Es {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y amig{mf|o|a} de Denz. Si quiere intervenir, es libre de hacerlo. Nombre al heredero personalmente, si lo desea; yo no protestaré. Puede que haya problemas con el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, pero... sé qué regalos enviar para que olviden este asunto».

languages.text: 「あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}であり、デンツのご友人です。介入したいのであればご自由に。お望みでしたら自らを相続人と名乗り出たとしても、私は反対はしません。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}と揉める可能性もありますが…私の手にかかればいくらでも根回しができます」
languages.original_text: "You are a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and Denz's friend. If you want to intervene, then do so. Name the heir yourself, if you like, I won't voice a word of protest. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}であり、デンツのご友人です。介入したいのであればご自由に。お望みでしたら自らを相続人と名乗り出たとしても、私は反対はしません。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}と揉める可能性もありますが…私の手にかかればいくらでも根回しができます」

languages.text: "Ihr seid {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}{/g} und wart mit Denz befreundet. Wenn Ihr intervenieren wollt, nur zu. Benennt selbst einen Erben, ich werde keinen Protest einlegen. Es könnte Probleme mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} geben, aber ... ich weiß, wen ich schmieren muss, um sie zu lösen."
languages.original_text: "You are a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and Denz's friend. If you want to intervene, then do so. Name the heir yourself, if you like, I won't voice a word of protest. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} und wart mit Denz befreundet. Wenn Ihr intervenieren wollt, nur zu. Benennt selbst einen Erben, ich werde keinen Protest einlegen. Es könnte Probleme mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} geben, aber ... ich weiß, wen ich schmieren muss, um sie zu lösen."

languages.text: « Vous êtes {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}{/g}, en plus d'avoir été l'{mf|ami|amie} de Denz. Si vous souhaitez intervenir, alors faites. Nommez vous-même l'héritier si ça vous chante, ce n'est pas moi qui protesterai. L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} risque de vouloir interférer, mais... je sais quelles pattes graisser pour qu'ils vous laissent en paix. »
languages.original_text: "You are a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and Denz's friend. If you want to intervene, then do so. Name the heir yourself, if you like, I won't voice a word of protest. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, en plus d'avoir été l'{mf|ami|amie} de Denz. Si vous souhaitez intervenir, alors faites. Nommez vous-même l'héritier si ça vous chante, ce n'est pas moi qui protesterai. L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} risque de vouloir interférer, mais... je sais quelles pattes graisser pour qu'ils vous laissent en paix. »

languages.text: "Siz hem {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'siniz{/g} hem de Denz'in dostusunuz. Müdahil olmak istiyorsanız buyurun. Dilerseniz vârisi siz belirleyin, gıkımı çıkartmam. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} sorun çıkarabilir... Ama onları uzaklaştırmak için kimlere para yedirmeniz gerektiğini biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "You are a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and Denz's friend. If you want to intervene, then do so. Name the heir yourself, if you like, I won't voice a word of protest. There might be issues with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, but... I know which palms to grease to make them go away."

traits.locale_text: "Siz bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'siniz ve Denz'in dostusunuz. Bu işe müdahale etmek istiyorsanız buyurun. Dilerseniz vârisi siz belirleyin, karşı çıkmayacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} sorun çıkarabilir ama... Onları uzaklaştırmak için kimlerin sırtını sıvazlamak gerektiğini iyi bilirim."
